radiographic_examinations.findings: Decreased sympathetic nerve function or innervation demonstrated by an H:M ratio of 2.1 before treatment, and 3.0 during treatment. The washout rate was 21% on delayed images before treatment and 15% during treatment.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increase in H:M ratio and decrease in washout rate indicating improvement during treatment.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Nonreversible myocardial perfusion defects in the anterior, inferoposterior, and apical walls.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No changes observed in resting SPECT images after treatment.
